title: LEVX Twitter Distribution Plan
body:
# Class Society
This is a rough ideation of how to distribute 30k LEVX for my twitter followers. Basically they’re divided into 5 classes. We’re not living in communism. It’s obvious that the more you contribute, the more you receive.

## Class 1: I, LevX
I’m the one who was following myself from the beginning and made all this possible, including community building, offering vision and distributing a shitty token $OH-GEEZ to make some noise in this space. 10% of all my crypto income from on-going & upcoming protocols, SharkPunks, MaidCoin, BearFi and LevX will go to LEVX holders eternally(ah and 30-50% of Shoyu grant as well) so I believe I deserve to be class 1.

## Class 2: Core contributors in discord
Anyone can become a core contributor in our discord by giving your effort & time to the community(@So What If He’s The Devil, Rick?) or boosting the server(@Existense Is Pain) or buying 10% $OH-GEEZ LP tokens (@Show Me What You Got). Ah, sushi team members who helped me(@Squanchys) as well.
I’m not saying all of them will get the same amount even one can get 2x than another.

## Class 3: Noise makers
Have you actively tweeted frequently to introduce our dao to the crypto people? Then you’re eligible for this. The more you contributed, the more you’ll get in this group.

## Class 4: Passive participants & Early believers
These are not that active but were my fans from old days and they supported me for a long time. Those who reacted to my tweets before the announcement of LEVX airdrop will get the most amount.

## Class 5: Others
If you followed me after my LEVX airdrop tweet but didn’t quite react to my tweets, nor actively tried to introduce our community, you’re in this group. I will give tokens to them but if all they did was just follow me, they’ll receive the smallest amount.

# Distribution
* Class 1: 3k (10%)
* Class 2: 6k (20%)
* Class 3: 9k (30%)
* Class 4: 6k (20%)
* Class 5: 6k (20%)
author: 0x5b8C253517b6Bd003369173109693B01cb6841B5
